eidolons.name: Life Is a Gamble
eidolons.description: The Ultimate recovers 1 more Skill Point. The Talent additionally increases the Max Skill Points by 1.

eidolons.name: Parallax Truth
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Narrative Polysemy
eidolons.description: The CRIT DMG Boost effect provided by the Skill additionally increases by an amount equal to 30% of Sparkle's CRIT DMG. When Sparkle uses Skill, her Skill's CRIT DMG Boost effect will apply to all allies with Cipher. When Sparkle uses her Ultimate, any single ally who benefits from her Skill's CRIT DMG Boost will spread that effect to allies with Cipher.

eidolons.name: Cut With Ease
eidolons.description: After using Skill against a Weakness Broken enemy, regenerates 1 Skill Point.

eidolons.name: Refine in Toil
eidolons.description: After triggering Sword Stance, the DMG taken by Sushang is reduced by 20% for 1 turn.

eidolons.name: Rise From Fame
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Cleave With Heart
eidolons.description: Sushang's Break Effect increases by 40%.

eidolons.name: Prevail via Taixu
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Dwell Like Water
eidolons.description: Talent's SPD Boost is stackable and can stack up to 2 times. Additionally, after entering battle, Sushang immediately gains 1 stack of her Talent's SPD Boost.

eidolons.name: Windfall of Lucky Springs
eidolons.description: After using their Ultimate, the ally with Benediction gains a 20% increase in SPD for 1 turn.

eidolons.name: Gainfully Gives, Givingly Gains
eidolons.description: The ally with Benediction regenerates 5 Energy after defeating an enemy. This effect can only be triggered once per turn.

eidolons.name: Halcyon Bequest
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Jovial Versatility
eidolons.description: The DMG multiplier provided by Benediction increases by 20%.

eidolons.name: Sauntering Coquette
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Peace Brings Wealth to All
eidolons.description: Ultimate regenerates 10 more Energy for the target ally.

eidolons.name: Future Market
eidolons.description: When enemies afflicted with Proof of Debt receive follow-up attacks, they will enter the Debtor state. This can take effect only once within a single action. The Debtor state increases the CRIT DMG of follow-up attacks inflicted on the target enemies by 25%, stacking up to 2 time(s). When Proof of Debt is removed, the Debtor state is also removed.

eidolons.name: Bona Fide Acquisition
eidolons.description: After Numby takes action and launches an attack, Topaz regenerates 5 Energy.

eidolons.name: Seize the Big and Free the Small
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Agile Operation
eidolons.description: After Numby's turn begins, Topaz's action is Advanced Forward by 20%.

eidolons.name: Inflationary Demand
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Incentive Mechanism
eidolons.description: Numby's attack count during the Windfall Bonanza! state increases by 1, and its Fire RES PEN increases by 10% when it attacks.

eidolons.name: Earth-Shaking Resonance
eidolons.description: When the Trailblazer uses their Basic ATK, additionally deals Fire DMG equal to 25% of the Trailblazer's DEF. When the Trailblazer uses their enhanced Basic ATK, deal Additional Fire DMG equal to 50% of the Trailblazer's DEF.

eidolons.name: Time-Defying Tenacity
eidolons.description: The Shield applied to all allies from the Trailblazer's Talent will block extra DMG equal to 2% of the Trailblazer's DEF plus 27.

eidolons.name: Trail-Blazing Blueprint
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Nation-Building Oath
eidolons.description: At the start of the battle, immediately gains 4 stack(s) of Magma Will.

eidolons.name: Spirit-Warming Flame
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: City-Forging Bulwarks
eidolons.description: After the Trailblazer use enhanced Basic ATK or Ultimate, their DEF increases by 10%. Stacks up to 3 time(s).

eidolons.name: Best Seat in the House
eidolons.description: After using Skill for the first time, immediately recovers 1 Skill Point(s).

eidolons.name: Jailbreaking Rainbowwalk
eidolons.description: When the battle starts, the Trailblazer's Energy Regeneration Rate increases by 25%, lasting for 3 turn(s).

eidolons.name: Sanatorium for Rest Notes
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Dove in Tophat
eidolons.description: While the Trailblazer is on the field, increases the Break Effect of all teammates (excluding the Trailblazer), by an amount equal to 15% of the Trailblazer's Break Effect.

eidolons.name: Poem Favors Rhythms of Old
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Tomorrow, Rest in Spotlight
eidolons.description: The number of additional DMG applications by the Skill increases by 2.

eidolons.name: A Falling Star
eidolons.description: When enemies are defeated due to the Trailblazer's Ultimate, the Trailblazer regenerates 10 extra Energy. This effect can only be triggered once per attack.

eidolons.name: An Unwilling Host
eidolons.description: Attacking enemies with Physical Weakness restores the Trailblazer's HP equal to 5% of the Trailblazer's ATK.

eidolons.name: A Leading Whisper
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: A Destructing Glance
eidolons.description: When attacking an enemy with Weakness Break, CRIT Rate is increased by 25%.

eidolons.name: A Surviving Hope
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: A Trailblazing Will
eidolons.description: The Trailblazer's Talent is also triggered when they defeat an enemy.

eidolons.name: Legacy of Honor
eidolons.description: After Welt uses his Ultimate, his abilities are enhanced. The next 2 time(s) he uses his Basic ATK or Skill, deals Additional DMG to the target equal to 50% of his Basic ATK's DMG multiplier or 80% of his Skill's DMG multiplier respectively.

eidolons.name: Conflux of Stars
eidolons.description: When his Talent is triggered, Welt regenerates 3 Energy.

eidolons.name: Prayer of Peace
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1. up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Appellation of Justice
eidolons.description: Base chance for Skill to inflict SPD Reduction increases by 35%.

eidolons.name: Power of Kindness
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Prospect of Glory
eidolons.description: When using Skill, deals DMG for 1 extra time to a random enemy.

eidolons.name: Dvesha, Inhibited
eidolons.description: Increases the DMG dealt by the Talent's follow-up attack by 40%.

eidolons.name: Klesha, Breached
eidolons.description: Talent's follow-up attack reduces enemy Toughness regardless of Weakness types. At the same time, restores Xueyi's HP by an amount equal to 5% of her Max HP. When breaking Weakness, triggers the Quantum Break Effect.

eidolons.name: Duḥkha, Ceased
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1. up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Karma, Severed
eidolons.description: When using Ultimate, increases Break Effect by 40% for 2 turn(s).

eidolons.name: Deva, Enthralled
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Saṃsāra, Mastered
eidolons.description: The max stack limit for Karma decreases to 6.

eidolons.name: Svelte Saber
eidolons.description: When Yanqing attacks a Frozen enemy, he deals Additional Ice DMG equal to 60% of his ATK.

eidolons.name: Supine Serenade
eidolons.description: When Soulsteel Sync is active, Energy Regeneration Rate increases by an extra 10%.

eidolons.name: Sword Savant
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1. up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Searing Sting
eidolons.description: When the current HP percentage is 80% or higher, Ice RES PEN increases by 12%.

eidolons.name: Surging Strife
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Swift Swoop
eidolons.description: If the Ultimate's buffs are still in effect when an enemy is defeated, their duration is extended by 1 turn.

eidolons.name: Aerial Marshal
eidolons.description: At the start of battle, increases the SPD of all allies by 10% for 2 turn(s).

eidolons.name: Skyward Command
eidolons.description: When any ally's current energy is equal to its energy limit, Yukong regenerates an additional 5 energy. This effect can only be triggered once for each ally. The trigger count is reset after Yukong casts her Ultimate.

eidolons.name: Torrential Fusillade
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1. up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Zephyrean Echoes
eidolons.description: When "Roaring Bowstrings" is active, Yukong deals 30% more DMG to enemies.

eidolons.name: August Deadshot
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Bowstring Thunderclap
eidolons.description: When Yukong uses her Ultimate, she immediately gains 1 stack(s) of "Roaring Bowstrings."

eidolons.name: Weathered Blade Does Not Sully
eidolons.description: Increases DMG dealt by "Intuit: Slash" and "Intuit: Cull" by 20%. Increases the number of additional DMG instances for "Intuit: Cull" by 3.

eidolons.name: First Luster Breaks Dawn
eidolons.description: When dealing DMG via Counter, ignores 20% of the target's DEF.

eidolons.name: Mastlength Twirls Mountweight
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Artisan's Ironsong
eidolons.description: After launching "Intuit: Slash" or "Intuit: Cull", increases this unit's Effect RES by 50%, lasting for 1 turn(s).

eidolons.name: Blade of Old Outlasts All
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Walk in Blade, Talk in Zither
eidolons.description: While Parry is active, if an enemy actively uses their abilities, regardless of whether it attacks Yunli or not, it will trigger "Intuit: Cull" and remove the "Parry" effect. When dealing DMG via "Intuit: Slash" or "Intuit: Cull", increases CRIT Rate by 15% and Physical RES PEN by 20%.
